what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Pervasive Developmental Disorders ?,"The NINDS conducts and supports research on developmental disabilities, including PDD. Much of this research focuses on understanding the neurological basis of PDD and on developing techniques to diagnose, treat, prevent, and ultimately cure this and similar disorders.",NINDS,Pervasive Developmental Disorders
What is (are) Transient Ischemic Attack ?,"A transient ischemic attack (TIA)
